title: MADE Show 2024 Video: Builder Roundup #1
content:
MADE Show 2024 is now in the rearview mirror, but there’s still plenty of coverage for all the incredible bikes. This time, Tyler checks out some of our favorite bikes from Celilo Wood Bikes, Chumba, Destroy, English Cycles, Mischief, No. 22, Rodriguez, Schön, and Thomson. More coming soon!

The post MADE Show 2024 Video: Builder Roundup #1 appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
